name: Space Mining (JamieCarmichael)
description:
In this asteroids like game you need to destroy asteroids and alien ships to increase your score. Between waves of asteroids you will be given the option of improving your ship but it will decrease your score.

Controls:

Forward: W

Turn: A D

Move Sideways: Q E

Break: S

Fire Laser: Space

Credits:

Jamie Carmichael
